source.title: Can 'miracle mineral' magnesium really help us sleep?

facts: Magnesium is the mineral of the moment, with a global market worth nearly £3bn.
The recommended daily amount for women is 270mg and for men, it's 300mg.
Around 10% of men and 20% of women are not getting the recommended daily intake of magnesium.
Magnesium helps nerves send messages properly and supports brain cell membranes.

neutral.headline: Global Magnesium Market Worth Nearly £3bn
neutral.body_html: The global magnesium market is valued at nearly £3 billion, with a significant portion of the population not meeting their daily recommended intake.

conservative.headline: Magnesium Market Booming Amidst Supplement Popularity
conservative.body_html: The global magnesium market, worth nearly £3 billion, is growing as millions take supplements for various health reasons. Despite this popularity, experts caution against unnecessary supplementation without addressing dietary deficiencies first.

liberal.headline: Magnesium Supplements: A Trend or Necessity?
liberal.body_html: With the global magnesium market nearing £3 billion, millions are turning to supplements for health benefits. Experts like dietitian Kirsten Jackson emphasize looking at one's diet before considering supplementation and caution against overconsumption due to potential side effects.
